original: 待時機成熟，諸葛亮上書《出師表》，文中詳述北伐之因，並傳達統一中原的希望，劉禪亦向諸葛亮下詔出師，正式北伐。
text: When the time is right, Zhuge Liang wrote a letter to "Appearing a Teacher", which detailed the reasons for the Northern Expedition and conveyed the hope of unifying the Central Plains. Liu Chan also sent an edict to Zhuge Liang to formally start the Northern Expedition.
